TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblyCultureAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblyCultureAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AssemblyCultureAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定組件所支援的文化特性。

span.span: Specifies which culture the assembly supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可由編譯器來區分主要組件的附屬組件。The attribute is used by compilers to distinguish between a main assembly and a satellite assembly. 主要組件包含程式碼和中性文化特性的資源。A main assembly contains code and the neutral culture's resources. 附屬組件中包含只針對特定的文化特性的資源`[assembly:AssemblyCultureAttribute("de")]`。A satellite assembly contains only resources for a particular culture, as in `[assembly:AssemblyCultureAttribute("de")]`. 將這個屬性在組件上放置和使用空字串以外的項目 ("") 的文化特性名稱，將這個組件的附屬組件的外觀，而不是主要組件，其中包含可執行程式碼。Putting this attribute on an assembly and using something other than the empty string ("") for the culture name will make this assembly look like a satellite assembly, rather than a main assembly that contains executable code. 設定標籤以這個屬性的傳統的程式庫會中斷，因為沒有其他程式碼可以在執行階段尋找媒體櫃中的進入點。Labeling a traditional code library with this attribute will break it, because no other code will be able to find the library's entry points at runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱通用語言基礎結構 (CLI) 文件，尤其是 < 磁碟分割 II： 中繼資料定義和語意 >。For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 您可以線上取得這份文件；請參閱 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和通用語言基礎結構標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)，以及 Ecma International 網站上的[標準 ECMA-335 - 通用語言基礎結構 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 屬性化組件所支援的文化特性 (Culture)。

span.span: The culture supported by the attributed assembly.

summary.span: 使用屬性化組件所支援的文化特性 (Culture)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the culture supported by the assembly being attributed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文化特性名稱遵循 RFC1766 名稱。The culture names follow the RFC1766 names. 格式如下所示:"language"-"國家/地區。The format is as follows: "language"-"country/region". 例如，英文 （美國） 格式為"EN-US"。For example, the format for US English is "en-US".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Culture As String
public: property System::String ^ Culture { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬性化組件所支援的文化特性 (Culture)。

span.span: Gets the supported culture of the attributed assembly.

value.span: 字串，含有所支援的文化特性的名稱。

span.span: A string containing the name of the supported culture.
